EmailTemplate.description: Individual FPR Courtesy Reviewer Reviewed with Comments, others are still pending Email
EmailTemplate.name: Individual FPR Courtesy Reviewer Commented
EmailTemplate.subject: Courtesy FPR {!PubReviewTeam__c.Publication__c} Includes Comments from {!PubReviewTeam__c.Reviewer__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Do not reply to this email message.
{!PubReviewTeam__c.Reviewer__c} has commented on FPR {!PubReviewTeam__c.PubIDLink__c} . Contact the FPR coordinator, {!PubReviewTeam__c.AssignedFPRCFF__c}, If you have questions or feel free to contact the reviewer referenced above.
{!PubReviewTeam__c.PubIDLink__c}
Thank you, FPR System
